verbose_text: BHB in combination with ACA also appears to promote opening of mitochondrial ATP sensitive K + (mtK ATP) channels [XREF_BIBR], which in heart mitochondria is known to protect against Ca + overload [XREF_BIBR] and dissipate membrane potential (DeltaPsi) [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: BHB in combination with ACA also appears to promote opening of mitochondrial ATP
